Name: Chernabog
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with The Black Claws of Evil.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

At the beginning of the Will power step select an enemy Formation within 18" and roll XD6 where X is the number of models that were destroyed this round. For each result of 6+ the selected Formation suffers 1 ethereal damage.

In the Tactics step you may select a single friendly non-LEGENDARY model within 6" of this model and destroy it. Then, improve this model’s Attacks Characteristic by X where X is the Attacks Characteristic of the destroyed model until the end of the round and this model regains Y Health where Y is the Health Characteristic of the destroyed model.

Spells.Name: Shroud of Darkness (35)
Spells.Effect: Select a friendly Formation within 12" of this model. Until the end of the round whenever an attack targets the affected Formation subtract 1 from the hit roll. In addition, whenever an attack targets the affected Formation, on a hit roll of 1 the attacking Formation suffers 1 ethereal damage.

Spells.Name: Flames of Corruption (35)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 9" of this model and then roll 3D6. For each result of 4+ the selected Formation suffers D6 ethereal damage.
